original: @64b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @64b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra t'a ki n'i g'i ti n'a ma /
analyzed: badzra t'a ki n'i g'i ti n'a ma /
translated: Vajra·∏çƒÅkinƒ´gƒ´ti-nƒÅma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: @65a * // rdo rje mnga' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba /
analyzed: @65a * // rdo rje mnga' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba /
translated: The Song of Symbolic Meaning of the Vajra·∏çƒÅkinƒ´

original: rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the venerable one.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lta ba'i brda bstan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lta ba'i brda bstan pa /
translated: The teaching of the symbolic view realized by the Vajra·∏çƒÅkinƒ´:

original: gser gyi ral gri til dar ldan pa dbyung la //
analyzed: gser gyi ral gri til dar ldan pa dbyung la //
translated: Take out the golden sword with the silk thread,

original: bung pas me tog rtsi bcud ma lus myang par gyis //
analyzed: bung pas me tog rtsi bcud ma lus myang par gyis //
translated: and the bee will taste all the nectar of the flowers.

original: chu bran sna tshogs pa rgya mtsho gcig go lan tshva'i ro //
analyzed: chu bran sna tshogs pa rgya mtsho gcig go lan tshva'i ro //
translated: The various small rivers are one ocean, the taste of salt.

original: me long bzhin ni byad yin gud du ma sems cig / chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa ltad mo byed //
analyzed: me long bzhin ni byad yin gud du ma sems cig / chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa ltad mo byed //
translated: The mirror is the face; do not think it is separate. The child watches the moon in the water.

original: bur ma gzugs 'di tha dad snang yang mngar ba'i ro //
analyzed: bur ma gzugs 'di tha dad snang yang mngar ba'i ro //
translated: This form of sugar appears separate, but it has a sweet taste.

original: nam mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje //
analyzed: nam mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje //
translated: Alas, the child who sees the form in space.

original: ri po rlung gis bskyod du med ba shin tu gces //
analyzed: ri po rlung gis bskyod du med ba shin tu gces //
translated: It is very important that the mountain is not moved by the wind.

original: ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam //
analyzed: ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam //
translated: If the palm tree is cut, both the top and the roots dry up.

original: nam mkha'i kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: nam mkha'i kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che //
translated: The color of the sky changes with the seasons.

original: 'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang grib mas la rgyu //
analyzed: 'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang grib mas la rgyu //
translated: A bird, though it lives in the sky, is soiled by the mud of the earth.

original: shel gyi kong bu'i mar me 'di la dri ma med //
analyzed: shel gyi kong bu'i mar me 'di la dri ma med //
translated: This lamp in a crystal lamp-stand is free from impurities.

original: rmi lam sad pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
analyzed: rmi lam sad pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
translated: This man who has awakened from a dream is happy in his mind.

original: gzings la gnas pa'i bya rog gang bder 'gro bar gyis //
analyzed: gzings la gnas pa'i bya rog gang bder 'gro bar gyis //
translated: Let the crow on the ship go wherever it wants.

original: khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di ni ltad mor che //
analyzed: khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di ni ltad mor che //
translated: This dog in the empty house is a great spectacle.

original: shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur ba med //
translated: Though a crystal is smeared with color, it does not change from within.

original: rang gis bsags pa'i gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos //
analyzed: rang gis bsags pa'i gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos //
translated: Gold that you have accumulated yourself does not need to be tested by cutting and burning.

original: ded dpon lam rgyus can dang 'grogs na nor bu lon //
analyzed: ded dpon lam rgyus can dang 'grogs na nor bu lon //
translated: If you travel with a captain who knows the way, you will obtain jewels.

original: drang srong nags la chud ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: drang srong nags la chud ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
translated: This sage who has entered the forest is truly amazing.

original: ku sha rlung gis bsgul ba'i rtsa ba aa re 'khrul //
analyzed: ku sha rlung gis bsgul ba'i rtsa ba aa re 'khrul //
translated: The root of the ku≈õa grass is confused because it is moved by the wind.

original: gdeng med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re rje //
analyzed: gdeng med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re rje //
translated: It is pitiful when someone without confidence acts like a hero.

original: sman dug 'dres pa 'di yi gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams //
analyzed: sman dug 'dres pa 'di yi gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams //
translated: The potency of this medicine is diminished by the poison mixed in it.

original: glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med //
analyzed: glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med //
translated: This elephant's form has no capacity to carry a load.

original: rin chen snod du gzhug nas 'tsho ba grong du slong //
analyzed: rin chen snod du gzhug nas 'tsho ba grong du slong //
translated: Place it in a jeweled vessel and beg for alms in the village.

original: nam mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim //
analyzed: nam mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim //
translated: Wearing space as clothing, the elements dissolve into their place of origin.

original: khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smar ma shes //
analyzed: khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smar ma shes //
translated: That person who pours water into a vessel does not know its value.

original: rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pas gshed ma la mi 'jigs //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pas gshed ma la mi 'jigs //
translated: Having obtained the king's permission, one is not afraid of executioners.

original: ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin gtub par byed //
analyzed: ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin gtub par byed //
translated: The weapon that is cut by a rotating sword wheel is cut.

original: 'dab ma gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha' la 'gro //
analyzed: 'dab ma gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha' la 'gro //
translated: A being with two wings flies in the sky.

original: aa ma mthong ba'i byis pa gzhan gyis 'khrid du med //
analyzed: aa ma mthong ba'i byis pa gzhan gyis 'khrid du med //
translated: A child seen by its mother cannot be led away by others.

original: sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la bskams //
analyzed: sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la bskams //
translated: The potency of both the seed and the cause is dried up in space.

original: nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon //
translated: The stars are outshone by the sun rising in the sky.

original: snying phyung de nas yan lag g-yo ba par ga la nus //
analyzed: snying phyung de nas yan lag g-yo ba par ga la nus //
translated: How can one move the limbs after the heart has been removed?

original: mtho yor mi ru shes pas de tshe 'jigs dang bral //
analyzed: mtho yor mi ru shes pas de tshe 'jigs dang bral //
translated: When a scarecrow is recognized as a human, one is then free from fear.

original: @65b sbrul nag mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral //
analyzed: @65b sbrul nag mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral //
translated: When a black snake is seized by a weapon, it is free from the harm of poison.

original: rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed //
analyzed: rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed //
translated: The king of resins transforms grains into essence.

original: rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med //
analyzed: rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med //
translated: This good son, the son of the Victor, has no effort.

original: dbul po rin chen gling du sna tshogs thabs kyis zhugs //
analyzed: dbul po rin chen gling du sna tshogs thabs kyis zhugs //
translated: The poor man goes to the island of jewels with various methods.

original: 'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g-yeng bar byed //
analyzed: 'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g-yeng bar byed //
translated: The great turbulent wind shakes the billion worlds.

original: dus mtha'i me yis srid gsum sreg par the tshom med //
analyzed: dus mtha'i me yis srid gsum sreg par the tshom med //
translated: The fire at the end of time burns the three existences without doubt.

original: bskal pa'i chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru //
analyzed: bskal pa'i chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru //
translated: The water of the eon completely washes away the environment and inhabitants from the ground.

original: zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: // / lta ba'i brda rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
analyzed: // / lta ba'i brda rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
translated: The DohƒÅ of the Vajra ·∏åƒÅkinƒ´, a Symbol of the View

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Volume One

original: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa /
translated: The ·∏åƒÅkinƒ´ of Buddhahood Reveals the Symbols of SamƒÅdhi Experience

original: drod gsher ldan pa de chos bon gang ba pa'i dus //
analyzed: drod gsher ldan pa de chos bon gang ba pa'i dus //
translated: When the seed of dharma is filled with moisture and warmth,

original: sa bon skyed med btab pas myu gu bskyed du sla //
analyzed: sa bon skyed med btab pas myu gu bskyed du sla //
translated: The seed is planted without cultivation, and the sprout is easily produced.

original: gyen thur lam la chu bo 'bab par 'gyur //
analyzed: gyen thur lam la chu bo 'bab par 'gyur //
translated: The river flows on the path of ups and downs.

original: nags tshal khrod du shing rta 'dren pa'i skyes bu blun //
analyzed: nags tshal khrod du shing rta 'dren pa'i skyes bu blun //
translated: The fool who pulls a chariot in the forest

original: rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyu //
analyzed: rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyu //
translated: If it has the seven jewels, it is the cause of a universal monarch.

original: so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la reg pas 'jig / seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du blugs mi bya //
analyzed: so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la reg pas 'jig / seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du blugs mi bya //
translated: A pot that has not been fired will break when it comes in contact with water; lion‚Äôs milk should not be poured into an inferior vessel.

original: dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag cis kyang bkol //
analyzed: dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag cis kyang bkol //
translated: Do not leave this body of a human, who is poor, at leisure; make it work.

original: sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che //
translated: It is amazing that a musical instrument is produced from various causes.

original: zhun sbyong lags pa'i rin chen 'di ni bkol na bde //
analyzed: zhun sbyong lags pa'i rin chen 'di ni bkol na bde //
translated: This jewel, which has been refined, is comfortable to use.

original: so mtshams srung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blud //
analyzed: so mtshams srung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blud //
translated: Give mercury to the person who guards the border.

original: nad kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad par bya //
analyzed: nad kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad par bya //
translated: When you are afflicted by illness, apply leeches.

original: nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar nas kyang //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar nas kyang //
translated: Having hoisted the precious jewel at the top of the victory banner,

original: mchod ba byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mchod ba byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: if you make offerings, various necessities and wishes will be produced.

original: 'a ma srin mos khyer mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la //
analyzed: 'a ma srin mos khyer mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la //
translated: Remember this: the one who was carried off by the demoness mother.

original: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'i gsob gon nas //
analyzed: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'i gsob gon nas //
translated: A strong man, having put on the lion‚Äôs skin,

original: nyi zla'i steng du dba' bo'i gdong la blta bar bya //
analyzed: nyi zla'i steng du dba' bo'i gdong la blta bar bya //
translated: should look at the face of the hero on top of the sun and moon.

original: rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni rtsad bcad nas //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni rtsad bcad nas //
translated: The king‚Äôs thief must be sought out by investigation.

original: gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal bar bya //
analyzed: gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal bar bya //
translated: This gem of a wrestler must be sought out by stratagem.

original: glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas srun //
analyzed: glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas srun //
translated: The mad elephant must be let loose to trample the enemy.

original: chu yi rnyog ma ma bsgul bzhag pas rim gyis dangs //
analyzed: chu yi rnyog ma ma bsgul bzhag pas rim gyis dangs //
translated: The muddiness of the water must be left undisturbed, and it will gradually clear.

original: bya ba zin ba'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
analyzed: bya ba zin ba'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde //
translated: The man who has accomplished his task is at ease in his mind.

original: lan tshva'i rdog po 'di la chu'i thigs pa gzan //
analyzed: lan tshva'i rdog po 'di la chu'i thigs pa gzan //
translated: The lump of salt will be dissolved by a drop of water.

original: chab rom nyi mas gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro //
analyzed: chab rom nyi mas gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro //
translated: The ice, when warmed by the sun, will become water.

original: dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi mchog / lbu ba chu yin 'di la tha dad yod ma yin //
analyzed: dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi mchog / lbu ba chu yin 'di la tha dad yod ma yin //
translated: The poison, when charmed by a spell, will become the best of medicines. The foam is water; there is no difference between them.

original: sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed //üîΩgsal bya gsal @66a * //
analyzed: sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed // gsal bya gsal @66a * //
translated: Exert yourself in the wind that disperses the clouds.

original: byed med ba'i sgron me bde ba che //
analyzed: byed med ba'i sgron me bde ba che //
translated: The lamp is the great bliss, which is neither the object of illumination nor the illuminator.

original: chu bo cha dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces //
analyzed: chu bo cha dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces //
translated: It is very important to be always in the company of the river.

original: 'gro ba bzang mo'i mya ngan 'di ni yid la zhog / nam mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gro /
analyzed: 'gro ba bzang mo'i mya ngan 'di ni yid la zhog / nam mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gro /
translated: Remember this grief of Bhadra, the traveler: The sky, the abode of the mind, is moving toward the east.

original: // / zhes bsgom pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
analyzed: // / zhes bsgom pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /
translated: This is the song of the dakinis, the symbolic meditation.

original: bam bo gnyis pa ;
analyzed: bam bo gnyis pa ;
translated: The second chapter.

original: til gyi sgron me bum pa'i nang du spar bar bya //
analyzed: til gyi sgron me bum pa'i nang du spar bar bya //
translated: Light a sesame lamp inside a vase.

original: tshes gcig zla ba 'di ni skyed du rim gyis 'phel //
analyzed: tshes gcig zla ba 'di ni skyed du rim gyis 'phel //
translated: This moon of the first day will gradually increase.

original: 'gro ba bzang mo rang gi phru gu gso ba mkhas //
analyzed: 'gro ba bzang mo rang gi phru gu gso ba mkhas //
translated: Bhadra, the traveler, is skilled in nourishing her child.

original: 'dab chags sgo nga'i ched du gab pa 'di la ltos //
analyzed: 'dab chags sgo nga'i ched du gab pa 'di la ltos //
translated: Look at this bird hiding for the sake of her eggs.

original: chu lud 'dzom pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin //
analyzed: chu lud 'dzom pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin //
translated: The fruit of the union of water and fertilizer ripens quickly.

original: 'tsho byed mkhas pa sman gyi nus pa sna tshogs brten //
analyzed: 'tsho byed mkhas pa sman gyi nus pa sna tshogs brten //
translated: The skilled physician relies on the various powers of medicine.

original: nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong //
analyzed: nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong //
translated: The forest fire is helped by various conditions.

original: gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis smra nus sam //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis smra nus sam //
translated: Can you speak of the pleasure of a young woman?üîΩDo not cherish this painting of the sky;

original: nam mkha'i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin cig / skyi ser 'di yis chu yi lbu ba dbyings su bdas //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin cig / skyi ser 'di yis chu yi lbu ba dbyings su bdas //
translated: this hail will destroy the water bubbles in the sky.

original: nam mkha'i sgron me dus rnams kun du sbar bar bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sgron me dus rnams kun du sbar bar bya //
translated: The lamp of the sky is lit at all times.

original: dngul gyi me long 'di ni yengs pa med par phyi //
analyzed: dngul gyi me long 'di ni yengs pa med par phyi //
translated: This silver mirror is turned outward.

original: ri rab mthon po'i rtse la byin pa 'di ci sems //
analyzed: ri rab mthon po'i rtse la byin pa 'di ci sems //
translated: What do you think of this gift placed on the peak of Mount Meru?üîΩWhat is said by this bee intoxicated by honey is the speech of a madman.

original: bung rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i tshig / nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog skran du gyur pa yod //
analyzed: bung rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i tshig / nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog skran du gyur pa yod //
translated: The best of medicines for curing illnesses becomes a tumor.

original: padma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung ba phyir mi lta //
analyzed: padma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung ba phyir mi lta //
translated: A bee that drinks the essence of a lotus does not look back.

original: shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar du lta ba gces //
analyzed: shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar du lta ba gces //
translated: Until you see a crystal stupa, it is important to look.

original: sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde //
analyzed: sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde //
translated: A person holding a lamp in his hand has a path of light.

original: khong du seng ge'i snying gis rtag tu brgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khong du seng ge'i snying gis rtag tu brgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: A person who always faints from the lion‚Äôs heart in his belly.

original: gser 'gyur rtsi yis dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms //
analyzed: gser 'gyur rtsi yis dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms //
translated: The elixir of alchemy destroys good and bad things without distinction.üîΩHaving mounted a great river, you fly in the sky like a bird.

original: chu bo chen po zhon nas nam mkha'i bya lam snyag / chu bo'i rgyun chad de dus rang thag 'khor mi nus //
analyzed: chu bo chen po zhon nas nam mkha'i bya lam snyag / chu bo'i rgyun chad de dus rang thag 'khor mi nus //
translated: When the flow of the river is cut, you cannot turn the water wheel.

original: 'khor lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde //
translated: The potter is happy when the rope of the spinning wheel breaks.

original: sprin gyis nam mkha'i dang las byung zhing de ru dengs //
analyzed: sprin gyis nam mkha'i dang las byung zhing de ru dengs //
translated: The clouds arise from the sky and dissolve there.

original: bltas kyi bltas kyi nam mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags /
analyzed: bltas kyi bltas kyi nam mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags /
translated: The sky is seen as long as one looks, but when one stops looking, it is not seen.

original: // / nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur //
analyzed: // / nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur //
translated: The Song of the Dakinis on the Symbolic Meaning of Experience

original: bam po gsum pa //
analyzed: bam po gsum pa //
translated: The third part

original: skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran gyis la //
analyzed: skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran gyis la //
translated: The mind of a man afflicted with illness

original: dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya //
analyzed: dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya //
translated: should remember this conduct of the cemetery jackal.

original: nags tshal khrod na ri dags dman ma gnas ba ltos //
analyzed: nags tshal khrod na ri dags dman ma gnas ba ltos //
translated: Look at the inferior deer dwelling in the forest.

original: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni su la'ang 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni su la'ang 'jigs pa med //
translated: This queen of the king is not afraid of anyone.

original: rdo yi mi la 'gran par nus pa ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: rdo yi mi la 'gran par nus pa ngo mtshar che //
translated: It is amazing that she can compete with a stone woman.

original: nags na gnas pa'i spre'u 'di yi spyod pa'am //
analyzed: nags na gnas pa'i spre'u 'di yi spyod pa'am //
translated: Look at the conduct of this monkey dwelling in the forest,

original: yang na rgyal bu @66b gzhon nu 'di la blta bar bya //
analyzed: yang na rgyal bu @66b gzhon nu 'di la blta bar bya //
translated: or look at this young prince.

original: mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir //
analyzed: mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir //
translated: Why is this bird flying in the sky like this?

original: 'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa snying re rje //
analyzed: 'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa snying re rje //
translated: In the granary, the one afflicted by hunger is pitiful.

original: phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod //
analyzed: phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod //
translated: Who would dare to have the conduct of a butterfly like this?

original: dong gi btson 'di thar ram yid la bya bar rigs //
analyzed: dong gi btson 'di thar ram yid la bya bar rigs //
translated: Is this prisoner of the pit to be released or not?

original: sdug bsngal rgyan du mthong ba'i glang po sgrog la dga' //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rgyan du mthong ba'i glang po sgrog la dga' //
translated: The elephant, seeing suffering as an ornament, delights in the fetters.

original: mtsho yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dgas snying re rje //
analyzed: mtsho yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dgas snying re rje //
translated: Alas, the deer who pursues a mirage in the water!

original: rin chen gling nas stong log byed pa'i ded dpon blun //
analyzed: rin chen gling nas stong log byed pa'i ded dpon blun //
translated: The fool who returns empty-handed from an island of jewels!üîΩThe wind of the sky, accompanied by the wind of the sky, wanders everywhere in the four directions.

original: nam mkha'i rlung dang 'grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun du rgyug / glang chen shugs kyis bag ma tshongs la khyi sha zo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rlung dang 'grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun du rgyug / glang chen shugs kyis bag ma tshongs la khyi sha zo //
translated: The elephant, with the speed of an elephant, eats dog meat.

original: smyon pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nam mkha' sman mchog ster//
analyzed: smyon pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nam mkha' sman mchog ster//
translated: Following the madman, the sky gives the supreme medicine.

original: nags la gnas pa'i ri dags 'di ni yan par bye //
analyzed: nags la gnas pa'i ri dags 'di ni yan par bye //
translated: This deer living in the forest is deceived.

original: 'dab chags mkha' la rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes ltos //
analyzed: 'dab chags mkha' la rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes ltos //
translated: Look at the footprints of this bird flying in the sky!

original: ral gri lag na thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsod //
analyzed: ral gri lag na thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsod //
translated: The man holding a sword in his hand kills whoever he meets.üîΩThis conduct of the strongman terrifies the small creatures.

original: gyad kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can phra mo skrag / khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsang tshig rlung la bskur //
analyzed: gyad kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can phra mo skrag / khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsang tshig rlung la bskur //
translated: The secret words of the brahmin are carried by the wind of the two, the dog and the pig.

original: mi mgo skam bo la ni shing gi skyes bu dga' //
analyzed: mi mgo skam bo la ni shing gi skyes bu dga' //
translated: A man without a head is not pleased with a wooden head.

original: gyi ling sgrog dang bral na kun du rgyug par rigs //
analyzed: gyi ling sgrog dang bral na kun du rgyug par rigs //
translated: When the fetters are removed, it is proper to run about.

original: kha ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The power of snow does not remain in the ocean.

original: shing lo rlung gis khyer ba 'di yi rtsad mi chod //
analyzed: shing lo rlung gis khyer ba 'di yi rtsad mi chod //
translated: The wind carries away the leaves of trees; it does not cut their roots.

original: nyi zla lta bur gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs //
analyzed: nyi zla lta bur gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs //
translated: When one becomes like the sun and moon, one is accompanied by a host of stars.

original: gru pa 'di yis skya pa nya ra bya bar rigs //
analyzed: gru pa 'di yis skya pa nya ra bya bar rigs //
translated: It is proper for this boatman to ferry across the fish.

original: dug 'di rma bya'i zas yin gzhan rnams phung bar byed //
analyzed: dug 'di rma bya'i zas yin gzhan rnams phung bar byed //
translated: This poison is the food of the peacock; it destroys others.

original: 'dab gshog med par mkha' la 'gro ba dor bar bya /
analyzed: 'dab gshog med par mkha' la 'gro ba dor bar bya /
translated: One should abandon going in the sky without wings.

original: // / spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur //üîΩbam po bzhi ba /
analyzed: // / spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur // bam po bzhi ba /
translated: The Song of the Dakinis on the Signs of Conduct

original: shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char //
analyzed: shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char //
translated: When the pure crystal egg dawns from within,

original: nam mkha'i gter la spyod pa'i skyes bu dbul dang bral //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gter la spyod pa'i skyes bu dbul dang bral //
translated: the person who uses the treasure of space is free from poverty.

original: snying gi dbus su padma'i ge sar smin par sla //
analyzed: snying gi dbus su padma'i ge sar smin par sla //
translated: It is easy for the pistil of the lotus to ripen in the center of the heart.

original: drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o ma rtsol bas mar du 'gyur //
analyzed: drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o ma rtsol bas mar du 'gyur //
translated: Milk that has the right temperature becomes butter through effort.

original: stong pa'i snod 'di nam chag tshe nam mkha' 'dres //
analyzed: stong pa'i snod 'di nam chag tshe nam mkha' 'dres //
translated: When this empty vessel breaks, it merges with space.

original: 'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha' la yal ba rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha' la yal ba rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: The rainbow vanishes into the sky at the time of its disappearance and cannot be found.

original: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di 'dra ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di 'dra ngo mtshar che //
translated: The various magical displays of space are like this. How amazing!

original: 'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad //
translated: The universal monarch gathers the various abodes.

original: rgun 'brum 'bras bu bsgul bas mi smin bzhag na smin //
analyzed: rgun 'brum 'bras bu bsgul bas mi smin bzhag na smin //
translated: The grape fruit does not ripen by shaking it. It ripens by leaving it.

original: nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci //
analyzed: nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci //
translated: What is the intention of this jewel that grants qualities?

original: nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med //
analyzed: nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med //
translated: The sun and moon rising in the sky have no concepts.

original: stong pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin //üîΩnam mkha'i @67a * //
analyzed: stong pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin // nam mkha'i @67a * //
translated: The magical display of emptiness ripens the harvest and fruit.

original: dbyings 'di sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen //
analyzed: dbyings 'di sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen //
translated: This space element shows various things. What are its conditions?

original: chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par gyis /
analyzed: chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par gyis /
translated: Understand the reflection of the moon in many water vessels.

original: // /'bras bu'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur /üîΩbam bo lnga pa /
analyzed: // /'bras bu'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur / bam bo lnga pa /
translated: The Song of the Symbolic Meaning of the ResultüîΩThe fifth section of the dakini's symbolic testament

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga ba zhes bya ba gsang mdzod na shog dril du gam ba las /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga ba zhes bya ba gsang mdzod na shog dril du gam ba las /
translated: called The Fifth Section of the Dakini's Symbolic Testament was extracted from the scroll in the secret treasury.

original: dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang /
analyzed: dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang /
translated: The chief consorts of the realm discussed this and gave it to Dampa Sangye.

original: slad kyi ding ri zla 'khor du zha ma lo ts'a bas bsgyur nas bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad /
analyzed: slad kyi ding ri zla 'khor du zha ma lo ts'a bas bsgyur nas bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad /
translated: Later, it was translated by the translator Shama in the presence of the moon of Dingri and entrusted to the bodhisattva lama Kunga.

original: 'di khyad par gyi mgur chen po brgyad las brda skong rnam ba bzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'di khyad par gyi mgur chen po brgyad las brda skong rnam ba bzhi rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the four perfect fulfillments of the symbols from among the eight great special songs.
